desc: Simplify your cleaning routine with premium task-specific innovative microfiber cleaning hacks and kits. Our best selling window cleaning kit is activated with water to remove 99% of bacteria and leaving your window streak free with no added chemicals. Mops, dusters, stainless steel, paper towel replacement, Save money

layout.text: E-Cloth is the smarter way to clean!
Remove dust, dirt and grime with JUST WATER!
